item.title: About
item.description:
I work as a software developer for Infotel since 2012. I worked on various Java projects in the industry and banking sectors.

I joined the SeedStack team in the end of 2013. SeedStack is an open source project to help teams build great applications easily and efficiently.

  • https://github.com/pith
  • https://careers.stackoverflow.com/pith
